content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and producing iron plates.

### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and producing copper plates.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts copper cables.
- Inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine.

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts iron gear wheels.
- Inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine.

### Copper plate mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace (position not specified) for copper plate production.

### Iron plate mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace (position not specified) for iron plate production.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace inventory management
- Check the furnace inventory before inserting items to ensure it has the capacity and the necessary ingredients to smelt.
